title: Barbed bolts

properties.name: description
properties.value: Barbed bolts are bronze bolts with barbed tips. Barbed bolts can be created through the Fletching skill at level 51, simply by using barb bolttips with bronze bolts. 30 barbed bolt tips can be obtained from the Ranging Guild Ticket Exchange in the Ranging Guild in exchange for 140 archery tickets. For each barbed bolt tip attached to a bronze bolt, a player is granted 9.5 Fletching experience.

Item ID881

Barbed bolts are bronze bolts with barbed tips. Barbed bolts can be created through the Fletching skill at level 51, simply by using barb bolttips with bronze bolts. 30 barbed bolt tips can be obtained from the Ranging Guild Ticket Exchange in the Ranging Guild in exchange for 140 archery tickets. For each barbed bolt tip attached to a bronze bolt, a player is granted 9.5 Fletching experience.

Barbed bolts require only a bronze crossbow to fire, so they may be used at level 1 Ranged as a superior version of bronze bolts. However, they both do less damage and are more expensive than opal bolts (e), so their usage is inadvised. Additionally, Ironmen require level 40 Ranged to enter the guild and buy the bolt tips, at which point much stronger weapons are available.

'''Barbed bolts''' are [[bronze bolts]] with barbed tips. Barbed bolts can be created through the [[Fletching]] skill at level 51, simply by using [[barb bolttips]] with bronze bolts. 30 barbed bolt tips can be obtained from the [[Ranging Guild Ticket Exchange]] in the [[Ranging Guild]] in exchange for 140 [[archery ticket]]s. For each barbed bolt tip attached to a bronze bolt, a player is granted 9.5 Fletching [[experience]].

Barbed bolts require only a [[bronze crossbow]] to fire, so they may be used at level 1 [[Ranged]] as a superior version of [[bronze bolts]]. However, they both do less damage and are more expensive than [[opal bolts (e)]], so their usage is inadvised. Additionally, [[Ironmen]] require level 40 Ranged to enter the guild and buy the bolt tips, at which point much stronger weapons are available.
